name: Fox It (Nidavellir Games)
description:
You are Feroy, a swift archer fox and you lost your childs in an open world. You cannot escape the world until you defeated Lord Magma, the tyrant emperor of the area. Lord Magma is a strong, big guy, who you cannot defeat easily because you are too weak yet. You have lost your strength because you lost your children, making you weaker as you are. Find you children and they give you back your actual strength, helping you to defeat Lord Magma. The more you find, the more easily you can beat the flame lord. But be aware of Turtoise McHogs which try to keep you from reaching your goal.

Credits

Milmalissa - Digital Artist & Level Design

manio & Ben - Music & Sounds

ThePeat - Programming
